title: Nijigaku’s Live: Day 1!
detail_text: <:th_ch0201/>Setsuna-chan, can you check if I’ve prepared enough water?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Sure.... It seems good. Can I have you check my end as well, Ayumu-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Okay. Umm.... I think it’s fine.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Fufu, we’ve gotten pretty used to preparing for lives, huh.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Yeah! It was tough at first.... But I guess it’s important to work on these kinds of stuff too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>That’s why we need to do lots of lives, right!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Fufufu, you’re right, Setsuna-chan. We need to do even more lives!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Then let’s enjoy today’s live first! I’m sure everyone has already gathered in the waiting room by now.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Waah, that’s right! We need to hurry back! Setsuna-chan, let’s also have fun today!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Let’s make it fun, heated up, and exciting!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
